TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you didn't really ask for anything else so there's no real effect

 

 

I wish to be able to have some peace and quiet

Granted. You enter a quiet place.

Spoiler

 

I wish you are able to  sit still.

Granted, I buy them a straight jacket. 

I require a milky bar, and pizza.

Edited August 18, 2021 by Hyperspace Industries
A milky bar is chocolate, I didn't change anything about the post, just added info

Granted. You ordered pizza, but overturned the milk and make the bar milky.

I wish a double portion of beef to stop those cows from polluting the atmosphere with greenhouse gases.

Granted, but it is rotten.

I wish I spoke German.

Granted. At one time, you spoke German. 

I wish for a rotten, infested, nausiating, corrupted, political russet potato that will give me stomach problems if I eat it.

Granted. The Matrix has you.

I wish for Matrix cheat codes.

Granted. You get all the cheat codes, which takes away all the challenge, which stops it being fun, you give up in disgust and go read a nice book.

I wish to know all the nice and polite people.

Granted. But they all work in the potato fields, so you never see them.

I wish for front row seats for the Green day concert

Granted. You get to set in the front row watching an old drunk Irishman singing Limericks for 4 hours straight.

 

I wish to know that which I currently do not know but will know in the future and should have known in the past.

Granted, you will know what you eat tomorrow.

I wish to be able to go on a vacation by airplane

Granted. You are strapped to the tail and spend the vacation picking insects out of your teeth, rehydrating your eyes and getting your hearing slightly back.

I wish I knew how to do all the cool modder things.

Granted, you are now able to do all the cool modder things but you get stranded on a deserted island for the rest of your life.

I wish for apple juice.

You get your juice but you don't know it was made of 5 apples all with worms inside.

I wish I can go on a 1-minute round trip to Proxima b.

Granted, you land on Proxima B, but you have no space suit and immediately die.

I wish for peace but the nice kind.

You rest in peace. 

I wish solar panels worked under trees

Granted, but because of the power we needed solar panels only work under trees now.

 

 

I want a rice porridge.

Granted. Together with a duck egg, porcupine bacon, and soy butter.

1 hour ago, Deddly said:

I wish solar panels worked under trees

Granted. You cut a tree and make the solar panel work from the light of the fire.

***

I wish for trains and trails in KSP.

Granted. You spend the next year putting in all the hard work to make them. (hint: I beams can be turned into statics to be used with KK, dirt roads already exist in KK, best built in 1.10.1 before the changes mucked up the editor and then imported into the latest iteration.)

I wish for Kerbiloid to put in the hard work so I can have a train set in KSP.

Granted. But as kerbiloid followed the local railroad standard, your trains mismatch the rails.

I wish other countries stopped showing off and used this railroad standard.

Granted. Every country everywhere now uses 1,435 mm standard gauge rail line but nobody changed their trains and the carnage is horrific.

I wish for maglev trains in KSP.

Granted. But they only hover, not move.

I wish for mods to play nicely with the base game.

Granted. But now they ONLY play nicely with the basegame, you can't have more than one mod be it however tinyy without the game instantly crashing and deleting itself.

 

 

I wish i could eat soup in a rocket that is launching.

Granted. But due to the G forces it goes straight through you with no time to digest. (ewww)

I wish it is not too messy.
Granted. The small mess however is stuck real hard and is impossible to clean
